name: white-flute
effect: Used outside of battle : Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.
short_effect: Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A white flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokémon more likely to appear.
flavor_text.platinum: A white flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokémon more likely to appear.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A white flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokémon more likely to appear.
